page.title: 08Employment in PAUNTLEY
page.content:
Included are{191 adults aged 19-65}and an unknown number of people aged 16-18
This is a "dormitory area" for highly paid people working in Gloucester, throughout the U.K. and Abroad. A high proportion of Adults are Retired or have Professional, Executive or Managerial status unconnected with agriculture. There are at least{76}different occupations, ranging from factory workers, journalist to computer consultant. Only{45}persons are employed in Agriculture. {Part-time}work employs{25}persons in a wide range of jobs.{6}others in agriculture. {9}persons are registered as fully unemployed.
